comment_data.body: Ok, I see what you mean. Yeah, that would be fine, but we use the same LICENSE.md in all repos, and I'd like to add a check that makes sure every repo has a LICENSE.md and that it is the GPL-3.0 one. If we remove that, we should remove it from everywhere. Also, I got this file from [here](https://github.com/IQAndreas/markdown-licenses/blob/master/gnu-gpl-v3.0.md), and I'd like to avoid deviations from that.
